note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, the data relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Income or consumption of the poorest 10% vs. mean income
subtitle: This is the level of income per person per day below which 10% of the population falls vs. the average income. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.

display.name: Income or consumption of the poorest 10%
